author: AFP, Agence France-Presse
title: Coronavirus did not come from us: Wuhan lab
description: Virology institute official dismisses conspiracy theories; Orthodox Christians mark Easter at home amidst COVID-19 fears
content:
A laboratory in the Chinese city at ground zero of the global COVID-19 outbreak has rejected U.S. theories that it spawned the pandemic.
The denial came as world governments were debating how and when to ease lockdowns that have kept more than half of humani… [+2653 chars]
